CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to enable a second video
stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop
feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on
Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that
the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
OldVersion.description:
The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get
webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and
registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems
including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs
are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
OldVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description:
Remote
attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame
video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition
(including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
OldVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
OldVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced file type coverage for DLP on Windows endpoints
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced file type coverage for DLP on Windows endpoints
OldVersion.description: ,With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
OldVersion.description:
,With this new
feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security
incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared
with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be
updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated
analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage (formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2. ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5. MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage
(formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview
Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were
previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following
events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2.
ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5.
MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
OldVersion.description:
We’re introducing the
ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook
for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to
you, you will be able to watch it directly in
your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same
organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video.
Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the
video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the
organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
OldVersion.description: ,Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
